## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project style guidelines
- [ ] I have added/updated tests for my changes
- [ ] All tests pass locally (`nox`)
- [ ] Coverage remains at 100%

### Agent-Specific (if applicable)
- [ ] Agent can understand and navigate this change
- [ ] AGENTS.md is updated if behavior changed
- [ ] `.agent/config.yaml` updated if config changed

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation
- [ ] I have added docstrings to new functions/classes

### Integration
- [ ] Changes work with LangGraph (if affected)
- [ ] Changes work with Google ADK (if affected)
- [ ] Bridge functionality preserved (if both enabled)
- [ ] MCP tools still accessible
- [ ] A2A protocol compatibility maintained
